医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明足球头球与大脑微结构和功能下降有关本周在北美放射学会 (RSNA) 年会上提出的新研究表明，足球头球（球员用头击球）与两年内大脑微观结构和功能的显着下降有关时期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Research-links-soccer-heading-to-decline-in-the-brain-microstruct-and-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Research-links-soccer-heading-to-decline-in-the-brain-microstruct-and-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7954ff91-c20d-4eeb-a7ce-91d9600168d1 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 13:09:51 -0500 Research links soccer heading to decline in the brain microstructure and function
机器学习程序可以更准确地理解细胞中的肽序列机器学习现在正在帮助研究人员分析陌生细胞的组成，这可能会导致在癌症和其他严重疾病的治疗中产生更加个性化的药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Machine-learning-program-provides-more-accurate-understanding-of-peptide-sequences-in-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Machine-learning-program-provides-more-accurate-understanding-of-peptide-sequences-in-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=556e750b-7d34-49d9-a0a3-2614270f2bc3 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 13:07:21 -0500 Machine learning program provides more accurate understanding of peptide sequences in cells
研究人员在对抗肺炎球菌肺炎方面取得了重大进展冠状病毒大流行的全球影响引发了人们对新出现和重新出现的传染病的重新关注。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Researchers-make-great-strides-in-combating-pneumococcal-pneumonia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Researchers-make-great-strides-in-combating-pneumococcal-pneumonia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e63f5c8-f52a-410a-b50c-d6e6dd7beffc Tue, 28 Nov 2023 13:01:06 -0500 Researchers make great strides in combating pneumococcal pneumonia
全因甲状腺毒症与认知障碍风险增加相关甲状腺毒症-;体内甲状腺激素水平过高 -;约翰霍普金斯大学医学院的一项新研究表明，这与老年人患认知障碍的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/All-cause-thyro毒症-关联-with-increased-risk-of-cognitive-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/All-cause-thyro毒症-关联-with-increased-risk-of-cognitive-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a8b4fae-858e-4931-99a8-39ea9daf3d0e Tue, 28 Nov 2023 12:46:32 -0500 All-cause thyrotoxicosis associated with increased risk of cognitive disorders
FDA 授予实验性 AML/MDS 治疗 1 期临床试验拨款急性髓系白血病 (AML) 和骨髓增生异常综合征 (MDS)——两种相关的血液疾病，对老年人的影响尤为严重——众所周知，它们很难治疗，并且复发率很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/FDA-awards-grant-for-phase-1-clinical-trial-of-experimental-AMLMDS-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/FDA-awards-grant-for-phase-1-clinical-trial-of-experimental-AMLMDS-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f0eb10a-b57d-4ab1-a7e6-8de83ab67cce Tue, 28 Nov 2023 12:39:05 -0500 FDA awards grant for phase 1 clinical trial of experimental AML/MDS treatment
研究人员开发出更快、更便宜、更精确的细菌识别方法研究人员开发出一种比以前更容易、更便宜、更准确地识别细菌的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Researchers-develop-faster-cheaper-and-more-precise-method-for-identifying-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Researchers-develop-faster-cheaper-and-more-precise-method-for-identifying-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=043392ff-0039-4b04-b84c-b07c9df44dc4 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 12:32:48 -0500 Researchers develop faster, cheaper, and more precise method for identifying bacteria
吸食大麻和吸烟可能会增加肺部损伤根据今天在北美放射学会 (RSNA) 年会上发表的研究，吸食大麻和香烟可能会导致肺气囊损伤加剧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Combined-marijuana-and-香烟-smoking-may-increase-lung-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Combined-marijuana-and-香烟-smoking-may-increase-lung-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f51542e-8727-4a86-b432-74e6bf3aa689 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 12:26:33 -0500 Combined marijuana and cigarette smoking may increase lung damage
免疫受体蛋白与小鼠的健康衰老和寿命有关根据发表在《细胞报告》杂志上的一项研究，小鼠的预期寿命和健康衰老可以由免疫系统某些细胞中存在的蛋白质决定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Immune-receptor- Protein-linked-to-healthy-aging-and-lifespan-in-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Immune-receptor- Protein-linked-to-healthy-aging-and-lifespan-in-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a19504b-d133-469e-bbba-e289636b4a4a Tue, 28 Nov 2023 12:21:49 -0500 Immune receptor protein linked to healthy aging and lifespan in mice
研究表明阿尔茨海默病患者的个人财富与医疗保健费用之间存在联系芬兰拥有强大的公共卫生保健体系；然而，个人财富与阿尔茨海默病患者的医院护理和药物费用相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Study-shows-link- Between-personal-wealth-and-health-care-costs-in-people-with-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Study-shows-link- Between-personal-wealth-and-health-care-costs-in-people-with-Alzheimere28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2afb2b21-91ad-47fb-9a4d-6c3f1982e11b Tue, 28 Nov 2023 12:17:03 -0500 Study shows link between personal wealth and health care costs in people with Alzheimer’s disease
果蝇研究揭示了生长停止的潜在触发因素所有动物都是从单细胞生物开始的，然后开始生长。当然，在某些时候，它们需要停止变得更大，但人们对这种情况发生的过程知之甚少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Fruit-fly-study-reveals-potential-trigger-for-growth-cessation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231128/Fruit-fly-study-reveals-potential-trigger-for-growth-cessation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e86a761b-656b-47a2-b432-350f4adaee19 Tue, 28 Nov 2023 11:27:29 -0500 Fruit fly study reveals potential trigger for growth cessation
